00055 unsigned char current_activated_ant_outputs_length = 0;

00067 unsigned char antenna_ctrl_get_comb_value(unsigned char antenna_comb) {
00068         unsigned char result = 0;
00069 
00070         if (antenna_comb == 1)
00071                 result = 0;
00072         else if (antenna_comb == 2)
00073                 result = 1;
00074         else if (antenna_comb == 4)
00075                 result = 2;
00076         else if (antenna_comb == 8)
00077                 result = 3;
00078         else if (antenna_comb == 3)
00079                 result = 4;
00080         else if (antenna_comb == 5)
00081                 result = 5;
00082         else if (antenna_comb == 9)
00083                 result = 6;
00084         else if (antenna_comb == 6)
00085                 result = 7;
00086         else if (antenna_comb == 10)
00087                 result = 8;
00088         else if (antenna_comb == 12)
00089                 result = 9;
00090         else if (antenna_comb == 7) 
00091                 result = 10;
00092         else if (antenna_comb == 11)
00093                 result = 11;
00094         else if (antenna_comb == 13) 
00095                 result = 12;
00096         else if (antenna_comb == 14) 
00097                 result = 13;
00098         else if (antenna_comb == 15) 
00099                 result = 14;
00100                 
00101         return(result);
00102 }
00103 
00107 unsigned char antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(unsigned char antenna_comb) {
00108         if (antenna_comb == 0)
00109                 return(1);
00110         else if (current_antennas.antenna_comb_allowed & (1<<antenna_ctrl_get_comb_value(antenna_comb))) {
00111                 return(1);
00112         }
00113         
00114         return(0);
00115 }
00116 
00121 void antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(unsigned char *addresses, unsigned char length, unsigned char cmd) {
00122         if (length > 0) {
00123                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<length;i++) {
00124                         if (addresses[i] != 0x00)
00125                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), addresses[i], (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), cmd, 0, 0);
00126                         else
00127                                 internal_comm_add_tx_message(cmd, 0 , 0);
00128                 }
00129         }
00130 }

00134 unsigned char antenna_ctrl_antenna_selected(void) {
00135         return(status.selected_ant & 0x0F);
00136 }

00139 void antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus(void) {
00140         if (status.selected_ant != 0) { 
00141                 unsigned char value = antenna_ctrl_get_comb_value(status.selected_ant);
00142                 
00143                 unsigned char length = current_antennas.antenna_output_length[value];
00144                 
00145                 if (length > 0) {
00146                         unsigned char temp[length];
00147         
00148                         unsigned char start_pos = 0;
00149                         unsigned char count = 0;
00150                         unsigned char addr_count=0;
00151         
00152                         unsigned char i=0;
00153                                 
00154                         antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_activated_ant_outputs, current_activated_ant_outputs_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_ANT_OUTPUTS);
00155                         current_activated_ant_outputs_length = 0;
00156                         
00157                         while(i<length) {
00158                                 if (current_antennas.antenna_comb_output_str[value][i] == OUTPUT_ADDR_DELIMITER) {
00159                                         //Will add which address the message was sent to
00160                                         current_activated_ant_outputs[addr_count++] = current_antennas.antenna_comb_output_str[value][i+1];
00161                                         
00162                                         if (current_antennas.antenna_comb_output_str[value][i+1] != 0x00)
00163                                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), current_antennas.antenna_comb_output_str[value][i+1], (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT, count-start_pos, temp+start_pos);
00164                                         else
00165                                                 internal_comm_add_tx_message(BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT,count-start_pos, (char *)(temp+start_pos));
00166         
00167                                         start_pos += count;
00168                                         i++;
00169                                 } 
00170                                 else {
00171                                         temp[count] = current_antennas.antenna_comb_output_str[value][i];
00172                                         count++;
00173                                 }
00174                                 
00175                                 i++;
00176                         }
00177                         
00178                         current_activated_ant_outputs_length = addr_count;
00179                 }
00180         }
00181         else if (current_activated_ant_outputs_length > 0) {
00182                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_activated_ant_outputs, current_activated_ant_outputs_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_ANT_OUTPUTS);
00183                 current_activated_ant_outputs_length = 0;
00184         }
00185 }

00189 void antenna_ctrl_send_rx_ant_data_to_bus(unsigned char antenna_index) {
00190         unsigned char length = rx_antennas.output_length[antenna_index];
00191         
00192         if (length > 0) {
00193                 unsigned char temp[length];
00194         
00195                 unsigned char start_pos = 0;
00196                 unsigned char count = 0;
00197                 unsigned char addr_count=0;
00198         
00199                 unsigned char i=0;
00200         
00201                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_activated_rx_ant_outputs, current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_ANTENNA_OUTPUTS);
00202                 
00203                 current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length = 0;
00204                 
00205                 while(i<length) {
00206                         if (rx_antennas.output_str[antenna_index][i] == OUTPUT_ADDR_DELIMITER) {
00207                                 //Will add which address the message was sent to
00208                                 current_activated_rx_ant_outputs[addr_count++] = rx_antennas.output_str[antenna_index][i+1];
00209                                 
00210                                 if (rx_antennas.output_str[antenna_index][i+1] != 0x00)
00211                                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), rx_antennas.output_str[antenna_index][i+1], (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT, count-start_pos, temp+start_pos);
00212                                 else
00213                                         internal_comm_add_tx_message(BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT,count-start_pos, (char *)(temp+start_pos));
00214                         
00215                                 start_pos += count;
00216                                 i++;
00217                         }
00218                         else {
00219                                 temp[count] = rx_antennas.output_str[antenna_index][i];
00220                                 count++;
00221                         }
00222                         i++;
00223                 }
00224                         
00225                 current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length = addr_count;
00226         }
00227 }

00231 void antenna_ctrl_send_rx_ant_band_data_to_bus(char index) {
00232         if ((index > 0) && (index < BAND_20M)){
00233                 unsigned char band_index = index-1;
00234                 unsigned char length = rx_antennas.band_output_length[band_index];
00235                 
00236                 if (length > 0) {
00237                         unsigned char temp[length];
00238                 
00239                         unsigned char start_pos = 0;
00240                         unsigned char count = 0;
00241                         unsigned char addr_count=0;
00242                 
00243                         unsigned char i=0;
00244                 
00245                         antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_band_activated_outputs_rx, current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_BAND_OUTPUTS);
00246                         
00247                         current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length = 0;
00248                         
00249                         while(i<length) {
00250                                 if (rx_antennas.band_output_str[band_index][i] == OUTPUT_ADDR_DELIMITER) {
00251                                         //Will add which address the message was sent to
00252                                         current_band_activated_outputs_rx[addr_count++] = rx_antennas.band_output_str[band_index][i+1];
00253                                         
00254                                         if (rx_antennas.band_output_str[band_index][i+1] != 0x00)
00255                                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), rx_antennas.band_output_str[band_index][i+1], (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT, count-start_pos, temp+start_pos);
00256                                         else
00257                                                 internal_comm_add_tx_message(BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT, count-start_pos, (char *)(temp+start_pos));
00258                 
00259                                         start_pos += count;
00260                                         i++;
00261                                 }
00262                                 else {
00263                                         temp[count] = rx_antennas.band_output_str[band_index][i];
00264                                         count++;
00265                                 }
00266                                 i++;
00267                         }
00268                                 
00269                         current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length = addr_count;
00270                 }
00271         }
00272         else if (current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length > 0) {
00273                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_band_activated_outputs_rx, current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_BAND_OUTPUTS);
00274                 current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length = 0;
00275         }
00276 }

00278 void antenna_ctrl_rotate(unsigned char ant_index, unsigned int heading) {
00279         current_antennas.antenna_direction[ant_index] = heading;
00280         
00281         printf("ROTATE TO: %i degrees\n",heading);
00282         
00283         //TODO: CODE TO SEND TO THE ROTATOR BOARD
00284         unsigned char new_dir[2];
00285         new_dir[0] = (heading >> 8)     & 0x00FF;
00286         new_dir[1] = heading & 0x00FF;
00287         
00288         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), current_antennas.rotator_addr[ant_index], (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_SET_ANGLE, 2, new_dir);
00289         
00290 }
00291 
00294 void antenna_ctrl_change_rx_ant(unsigned char ant_index) {
00295         if (ant_index != 0) {
00296                 antenna_ctrl_send_rx_ant_data_to_bus(ant_index-1);
00297         }
00298         else if (current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length > 0) {
00299                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_activated_rx_ant_outputs, current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_ANTENNA_OUTPUTS);
00300                 current_activated_rx_ant_outputs_length = 0;
00301         }
00302 }
00303 
00306 unsigned char antenna_ctrl_get_rotatable(void) {
00307         unsigned char flags = 0;
00308         
00309         for (unsigned char i = 0;i<4;i++)
00310                 if (current_antennas.antenna_flag[i] & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG))
00311                         flags |= (1<<i);
00312         
00313         return(flags);
00314 }
00315 
00317 void antenna_ctrl_deactivate_all(void) {
00318         if (current_activated_ant_outputs_length > 0) {
00319                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_activated_ant_outputs, current_activated_ant_outputs_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_ANT_OUTPUTS);
00320                 current_activated_ant_outputs_length = 0;
00321         }
00322 }

00325 void antenna_ctrl_deactivate_all_rx_band(void) {
00326         if (current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length > 0) {
00327                 antenna_ctrl_deactivate_outputs(current_band_activated_outputs_rx, current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length, BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_BAND_OUTPUTS);
00328                 current_band_activated_outputs_rx_length = 0;   
00329         }
00330 }

00455 unsigned char antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count(void) {
00456         unsigned char count = 0;
00457         
00458         for (unsigned char i=0;i<10;i++)
00459                 if (rx_antennas.name[i][0] != '\0')
00460                         count++;
00461         
00462         return(count);
00463 }

00480 void antenna_ctrl_select_default_ant(void) {
00481         if (current_antennas.default_antenna == 0)
00482                 event_tx_button1_pressed();
00483         else if (current_antennas.default_antenna == 1)
00484                 event_tx_button2_pressed();
00485         else if (current_antennas.default_antenna == 2)
00486                 event_tx_button3_pressed();
00487         else if (current_antennas.default_antenna == 3)
00488                 event_tx_button4_pressed();
00489 }
